Degree.comments: The candidate does not have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering.

Experience.comments: The candidate does not have 3+ years of experience as a back-end developer.

TechnicalSkills.comments: The candidate has some technical skills that are relevant to the position, such as database management and troubleshooting.

Responsibilities.comments: The candidate has experience in troubleshooting computer hardware and software issues, as well as configuring networks and providing technical support.

Certificates.comments: The candidate does not have any required certificates.

SoftSkills.comments: The candidate has strong communication, problem-solving, and teamwork skills.

SummaryComment: The candidate does not meet the degree and experience requirements, but has some relevant technical skills and experience in troubleshooting and providing technical support. They also have strong soft skills.
